movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO, but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

poster.caption: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hardy, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe, and Dileep Rao in Inception (2010)

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.plot: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

poster.caption: Leonardo DiCaprio in Shutter Island (2010)

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

poster.caption: Tom Hanks, Joan Cusack, Tim Allen, John Ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jodi Benson, Blake Clark, Estelle Harris, Jeff Pidgeon, Don Rickles, and Frank Welker in Toy Story 3 (2010)

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

poster.caption: Don Cheadle, Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Mickey Rourke, and Scarlett Johansson in Iron Man 2 (2010)

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

poster.caption: Jay Baruchel and Randy Thom in How to Train Your Dragon (2010)

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.plot: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.

poster.caption: Natalie Portman in Black Swan (2010)

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

poster.caption: Jesse Eisenberg in The Social Network (2010)

movies.title: The King's Speech
movies.plot: The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

poster.caption: Colin Firth in The King's Speech (2010)

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
movies.originalTitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
movies.plot: Harry Potter is tasked with the dangerous and seemingly impossible task of locating and destroying Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes. Harry must rely on Ron and Hermione more than ever, but dark forces threaten to tear them apart.

poster.caption: Rupert Grint, Daniel Radcliffe, and Emma Watson in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.plot: Gru, a criminal mastermind, adopts three orphans as pawns to carry out the biggest heist in history. His life takes an unexpected turn when the little girls see the evildoer as their potential father.

poster.caption: Steve Carell, Chris Renaud, Jemaine Clement, Miranda Cosgrove, Pierre Coffin, Elsie Fisher, and Dana Gaier in Despicable Me (2010)

movies.title: Kick-Ass
movies.plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

poster.caption: Nicolas Cage, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Chloë Grace Moretz, and Christopher Mintz-Plasse in Kick-Ass (2010)

movies.title: Tangled
movies.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

poster.caption: Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi in Tangled (2010)

movies.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
movies.plot: A young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes, who are willing to do anything to prevent her happiness with someone else.

poster.caption: Michael Cera in Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010)

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp in Alice in Wonderland (2010)

movies.title: The Town
movies.plot: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold the manager hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her.

poster.caption: Ben Affleck, Rebecca Hall, Jon Hamm, Blake Lively, and Jeremy Renner in The Town (2010)

movies.title: Easy A
movies.plot: When Olive lies to her best friend about losing her virginity to one of the college boys, a girl overhears their conversation. Soon, her story spreads across the entire school like wildfire.

poster.caption: Emma Stone in Easy A (2010)

movies.title: 127 Hours
movies.plot: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

poster.caption: James Franco in 127 Hours (2010)

movies.title: The Fighter
movies.plot: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

poster.caption: Mark Wahlberg and Christian Bale in The Fighter (2010)

movies.title: Tron: Legacy
movies.plot: The son of a computer programmer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

poster.caption: Jeff Bridges, Olivia Wilde, and Garrett Hedlund in Tron: Legacy (2010)

movies.title: The Expendables
movies.plot: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

poster.caption: Dolph Lundgren, Sylvester Stallone, Bruce Willis, Mickey Rourke, Jet Li, Jason Statham, Steve Austin, Terry Crews, and Randy Couture in The Expendables (2010)

movies.title: True Grit
movies.plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

poster.caption: Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin, and Hailee Steinfeld in True Grit (2010)

movies.title: Due Date
movies.plot: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

poster.caption: Robert Downey Jr. and Zach Galifianakis in Due Date (2010)

movies.title: Insidious
movies.plot: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

poster.caption: Ty Simpkins in Insidious (2010)

movies.title: The Book of Eli
movies.plot: A drifter fights his way across a ravaged, post-apocalyptic America while protecting a sacred book that holds the secrets to humanity's salvation.

poster.caption: Denzel Washington in The Book of Eli (2010)

movies.title: Salt
movies.plot: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

poster.caption: Angelina Jolie in Salt (2010)

movies.title: RED
movies.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover the assailants.

poster.caption: Morgan Freeman, Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, and Mary-Louise Parker in RED (2010)

movies.title: Megamind
movies.plot: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt, Ben Stiller, Will Ferrell, Kathy Griffin, Kristen Alderson, Kristen Ariza, Jack Blessing, David Cross, Walt Dohrn, Tina Fey, Stephen Kearin, Danny Mann, Tom McGrath, Mike Mitchell, J.K. Simmons, Peter Sohn, Justin Theroux, Christopher Knights, Jessica Schulte, Jonah Hill, Brian Hopkins, Jasper Johannes Andrews, Quinn Dempsey Stiller, Emily Nordwind, Ella Stiller, and Kristen Phaneuf in Megamind (2010)

movies.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
movies.originalTitle: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
movies.plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

poster.caption: Ben Kingsley, Jake Gyllenhaal, and Gemma Arterton in Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (2010)

movies.title: Grown Ups
movies.plot: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

poster.caption: Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Rob Schneider, David Spade, and Kevin James in Grown Ups (2010)

movies.title: The Other Guys
movies.plot: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

poster.caption: Mark Wahlberg and Will Ferrell in The Other Guys (2010)

movies.title: Clash of the Titans
movies.plot: Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.

poster.caption: Sam Worthington in Clash of the Titans (2010)

movies.title: Robin Hood
movies.plot: In twelfth-century England, Robin Longstride and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

poster.caption: Russell Crowe in Robin Hood (2010)

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
movies.plot: Danger once again lurks for Bella, with a malicious vampire seeking revenge. Amidst the turmoil, Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob, knowing the decision could trigger a battle between them.

poster.caption: Kristen Stewart, Taylor Lautner, and Robert Pattinson in The Twilight Saga: Eclipse (2010)

movies.title: The A-Team
movies.plot: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

poster.caption: Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley, and Quinton 'Rampage' Jackson in The A-Team (2010)

movies.title: The Tourist
movies.plot: A tourist on the train to Venice is approached by a mysterious woman for an unusual reason.

poster.caption: Johnny Depp and Angelina Jolie in The Tourist (2010)

movies.title: Predators
movies.plot: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

poster.caption: Predators (2010)

movies.title: Love & Other Drugs
movies.plot: In 1990s Pittsburgh, a medicine peddler starts a relationship with a young woman suffering from Parkinson's disease.

poster.caption: Anne Hathaway and Jake Gyllenhaal in Love & Other Drugs (2010)

movies.title: Incendies
movies.plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

poster.caption: Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin in Incendies (2010)

movies.title: Shrek Forever After
movies.plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

poster.caption: Mike Myers, Kathy Griffin, Mary Kay Place, Walt Dohrn, Jon Hamm, Billie Hayes, Jane Lynch, Mike Mitchell, Craig Robinson, Meredith Vieira, Kristen Schaal, Lake Bell, Ashley Boettcher, Danielle Soibelman, and Kristen Phaneuf in Shrek Forever After (2010)

movies.title: The Karate Kid
movies.plot: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the 12-year-old boy embraces Kung Fu, taught to him by a master.

poster.caption: Jaden Smith in The Karate Kid (2010)

movies.title: Knight and Day
movies.plot: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.

poster.caption: Knight and Day (2010)

movies.title: Blue Valentine
movies.plot: A couple cannot halt the downward spiral of their marriage.

poster.caption: Ryan Gosling and Michelle Williams in Blue Valentine (2010)

movies.title: Unstoppable
movies.plot: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

poster.caption: Denzel Washington and Chris Pine in Unstoppable (2010)

movies.title: The Next Three Days
movies.plot: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

poster.caption: Russell Crowe in The Next Three Days (2010)

movies.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
movies.originalTitle: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
movies.plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

poster.caption: Logan Lerman in Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief (2010)

movies.title: Machete
movies.plot: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

poster.caption: Robert De Niro, Steven Seagal, Danny Trejo, Jessica Alba, and Michelle Rodriguez in Machete (2010)

movies.title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
movies.plot: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

poster.caption: Tyler Labine, Alan Tudyk, and Katrina Bowden in Tucker and Dale vs Evil (2010)

movies.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
movies.plot: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

poster.caption: John Cusack, Chevy Chase, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson, Rob Corddry, Brook Bennett, Aliu Oyofo, and Jake Rose in Hot Tub Time Machine (2010)

movies.title: Get Him to the Greek
movies.plot: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

poster.caption: Russell Brand and Jonah Hill in Get Him to the Greek (2010)

movies.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
movies.plot: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

poster.caption: Milla Jovovich in Resident Evil: Afterlife (2010)
